song.title: Into your hands
song.lyrics:
[C] Into your hands I commend my spirit, God my only strength; Throughout the night guard me With your watchful power.
[V1] Hide me in the shadow of your outstretched wings, Keep me safe as the apple of your own eye.
[V2] When the light of day is hidden from my eyes, Shelter me always in your presence, my Lord.
[V3] May your Spirit light the path before my steps, In my heart keep the flame of love burning still.
[V4] Let not night conceal my grievous sin from me, Spread your peace over me till morning is come.
[V5] Come, my refuge, come the shelter of my soul, Take my thoughts, bind them to your service, o Lord.
[V6] When the dawn comes may I still enjoy your grace, I will sing, I will praise your glorious name.
